snippet: There was no word on whether the leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, 75, has prostate cancer, but doctors called the operation a success.
abstract: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran's highest leader, undergoes operation on his prostate; while rumors have circulated for more than 15 years that Ayatollah Khamenei has prostate cancer, occasion is first time state news media announced that he is undergoing treatment for condition.

byline.contributor: Tara Parker-Pope contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: There was no word on whether the leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, 75, has prostate cancer, but doctors called the operation a success.

headline.main: Iran’s Top Leader Undergoes Prostate Surgery
headline.print_headline: Iran’s Top Leader Undergoes Prostate Surgery
